timeline.message:
Refactor extendedBounds to use DoubleBounds

Refactors extendedBounds to use DoubleBounds instead
of 2 variables.

This is a follow up for #59175

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Could we provide a default DoubleBounds(null, null) in the constructor, and then just call DoubleBounds#effectiveMin here? (ditto for max and the below usage).  Especially since the logic for what to use for undefined is a little arbitrary (e.g. it's not obvious at a glance why we use POSITIVE_INFINITY instead of NAN), I'd rather just keep that logic in one place if possible.
timeline.author: not-napoleon
